name: Tamakushi Casket
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Sangonomiya Kokomi, equip this card.
After Sangonomiya Kokomi equips this card, immediately use Nereid's Ascension once.
When your Sangonomiya Kokomi, who has this card equipped, uses Nereid's Ascension: If Bake-Kurage is on the field, its Usage(s) will be refreshed.
While Ceremonial Garment exists, Bake-Kurage deals +1 DMG.
(You must have Sangonomiya Kokomi in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1205]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1205] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S12053]</color> once.
When your $[A1205], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S12053]</color>: If <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112051]</color> is on the field, its $[K3] will be refreshed.
While <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112052]</color> exists, <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112051]</color> deals +1 DMG.
(You must have $[A1205] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sangonomiya Kokomi</color>, equip this card.
After Sangonomiya Kokomi equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Nereid's Ascension</color> once.
When your Sangonomiya Kokomi, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Nereid's Ascension</color>: If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bake-Kurage</color> is on the field, its <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color> will be refreshed.
While <color=#FFFFFFFF>Ceremonial Garment</color> exists, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bake-Kurage</color> deals +1 DMG.
(You must have Sangonomiya Kokomi in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: Wisdom yet revealed from the casket parallels tides yet unfolded by the sea.
source: Reward for inviting Sangonomiya Kokomi to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
